content:
Credential Formats

  • ID Certificates

    • X.509
    • PGP
    • SDSI/SPKI

  • Attribute Forms

    • X9 attribute cert
    • SPKI attribute cert
    • ACL by name

  • Authorization Forms

    • SPKI authorization cert
    • X.509 SSL
    • X.509v3 extension
    • X.509 SET
    • PGPticket
    • ACL by key

      • ~/.ssh/authorized_keys
      • AADS / X9.59
      • SSL root key list
